articles.author: Giselle Ruhiyyih Ewing
articles.title: Putin confirms Russia fired new ballistic missile at Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Ukrainian President Zelenskyy says the move shows “how terrified” Moscow is of Ukraine.
articles.content: The move comes after U.S. President Joe Biden reversed his long-standing position and authorized Kyiv's use of American-supplied long-range missiles to strike targets within Russia last weekend, prom… [+1141 chars]
